panels.description: All endpoints with their HTTP method, total requests, and average response time

targets.expr: sum by (http_method, http_route) (http_server_request_duration_sum{http_route!~"/|/:studentId"}) / sum by (http_method, http_route) (http_server_request_duration_count{http_route!~"/|/:studentId"})

panels.title: Endpoint Performance Table

targets.expr: sum by (operation, collection) (rate(mongodb_operation_duration_ms_sum[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (operation, collection) (rate(mongodb_operation_duration_ms_count[$__rate_interval])) > 0
topk(10, sum by (collection, operation) (mongodb_operation_duration_ms_sum) / sum by (collection, operation) (mongodb_operation_duration_ms_count))
sum by (collection, operation) (mongodb_operation_duration_ms_sum) / sum by (collection, operation) (mongodb_operation_duration_ms_count)
